A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Absolute Worse Star Wars Movie To Date. It had so much potential. This was just really\, really bad on so many levels. What makes it so terrible I think\, is knowing just how amazing it could have and should have been. Oh well\, hopefully Disney can learn a hard lesson before it's too late. Don't screw with Star Wars. Yes you bought it\, but you were given a gift and a huge responsibility with this saga. The originals were not produced for the sake of making money. The originals were the dreams of George Lucas and a bunch of other amazing people. Please take a deep breath Disney and slow down on cranking out a bunch of Star Wars brand name films that are going to eventually be the death of a thriving franchise. I personally feel that they should not release it on blu ray\, but should totally rewrite the entire film and just forget this whole thing ever happened.
